abilities.name: Solar Essence
abilities.details:
Kharra-Ryn passively generates Solar Essence over time. She also gains a small amount of Solar Essence when nearby allies gain gold from killing an enemy unit.

Kharra-Ryn can use stored Solar Essence to craft an item for an ally hero. However, she will have to pay for a percentage of the gold cost for that item. The item tier is determined by the amount of Solar Essence used.

This ability has a cooldowns so she will have to wait for a long duration before being able to craft another item.

abilities.name: Golden Hammer
abilities.details:
Kharra-Ryn hurls her enchanted golden hammer, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) to the first enemy hit.

If Golden Hammer hits an enemy hero currently affected by any stack of Molten Impact, immediately maximise the stacks.

abilities.name: Molten Impact
abilities.details:
Kharra-Ryn imbues her hammer with solar energy, causing her next three basic attacks within a few seconds to deal bonus magical damage (scaling with health) and apply a stack of Molten Impact to the target.

Upon reaching three Molten Impact stacks, the target is dealt magical damage (scaling with the target's health) and gets stunned for a short duration. The stacks are then removed and can be replied again after a short cooldowns per target.

abilities.name: Power Strike
abilities.details:
Kharra-Ryn slams her hammer at a target enemy, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) and knocks back the target.

Enemies that collide with the knocked back target take the same physical damage and are briefly stunned.

abilities.name: Sun Forge
abilities.details:
Kharra-Ryn charges her golden hammer with immense solar power, unleashing a ground-shattering blow in a target direction, causing a massive fissure along the line. All enemies caught in the line are dealt physical damage (scaling with physical power) and are knocked up into the air.

Knocked up enemies also have their armour reduced for a short duration.
